Singing Box 331: Re-Sounding Eighteenth-Century Mohican Hymns from the Moravian Archives

Link
oieahc.wm.edu
Status
active
How they describe themselves
musicology, digital companion
Blurb
Digital interactive version of "Singing Box 331: Re-sounding Eighteenth-Century Mohican Hymns from the Moravian Archives," William and Mary Quarterly, 3d ser., 76, no. 4 (October 2019): 649-96. Includes text, musical excerpts, audio and video performances.
Creator(s)
Rachel Wheeler, Sarah Eylery
Steward(s)
Omohundro Institute, Indiana University-Purdue University at Indianapolis, Florida State University
